body_html: The nightly is working with my 2080 ti and CUDA 9.x and the 410 driver. No local compilation. No doubt it’s not exploiting all the goodness yet. I do encounter the error reported above, but on a second attempt to run operations, it works, and performance is better than my Titan XP.

body: The nightly is working with my 2080 ti and CUDA 9.x and the 410 driver. No local compilation. No doubt it’s not exploiting all the goodness yet. I do encounter the error reported above, but on a second attempt to run operations, it works, and performance is better than my Titan XP.
